Coz I've been wandering here for a while, but haven't seen it anywhere yet.

Btw, I'm looking for kato's disc chip, for the sake of an easier way to make a 'great' vesuvius out of durahan.

By Lisa Shock on Monday, September 19, 2011 - 10:49 am:

They are random. Just another way that this game is not easy.

By Azulazulazula on Monday, January 9, 2012 - 11:43 am:

NOTE ON KATO CHIPS: In the section on disc chips in the FAQ, it was stated (though with a very heavy "(?)") that a Kato's chips can be won ONLY IN TOURNEYS. In other words, if you're looking for Kato chips in Torles, ParePare, or Kawrea, forget it.
